title: Customized Mobile Mathematics Learning System: Context-Based Adaptive Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Work-applicable practical math-focused course for professionals, with content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model and solve real-world problems (e.g., budget estimation, data analysis) occurring in work environments.
Follow context-aware system-provided situational learning paths (learning flows) with over 90% adherence to perform self-directed learning.
Solve adaptive problems (formative assessments) presented in mobile environments with an average accuracy of 80% or higher

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
